title: Carrot cake
ingredients: ['4 eggs', '300ml (1/2 pint) vegetable oil', '400g (14 oz) caster sugar', '2 teaspoons vanilla extract', '250g (9 oz) plain flour', '2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '2 teaspoons baking powder', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '2 teaspoons ground cinnamon', '350g (12 oz) grated carrots', '125g (4 1/4 oz) chopped pecans', 'Icing', '125g (4 1/4 oz) butter, softened', '1 (200g) tub cream cheese, softened', '450g (1 lb) icing sugar', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '125g (4 1/4 oz) chopped pecans']
